title: glutton for punishment
body: am i the only one looking foward to laning against the new assassins?

replies.body: I am too...except Talon. Talon's going to be a nightmare with that new free wall-jumping ability.
but his damage is gutted in return.
talon is the one im looking foward to most, if hes not in vision then everyone needs to be on their toes.  and if im not playing as him then i wana play against him
Oh don't get me wrong, I don't mind Talon so much. It's just he's going to have around the same amount of power, but he also gets a huge boost in mobility.
